text: Hi, I'm training a client on how to post blogs to their HubSpot CMS site.  Is there a way to deactivate the featured image requirement?  These guys don't want or need that.

How do I set the order of posts in the related_blog_posts tag? I don't want to set a date range, I just want it to show the newest posts for a given tag

This defaults to showing the oldest posts for the given tag. And if I set a date range the content will become out of date eventually. I just want it to show newest to oldest.
